alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Giles; Marshall; Maury; Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:17PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marshall, southwestern Rutherford, Maury, southern Williamson, northeastern Giles and Bedford Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 316 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles west of Thompson`s Station to near Pulaski. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Columbia, Shelbyville, Lewisburg, Pulaski, Spring Hill, Thompson`s Station, Chapel Hill, Cornersville, Wartrace, Eagleville, Bell Buckle, Lynnville, Culleoka, Raus, Triune, Fosterville, Rover, Belfast and Frankewing. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 14 and 62. Interstate 24 between mile markers 75 and 90. Interstate 840 between mile markers 16 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Giles; Marshall; Maury; Rutherford; Williamson
